type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Cankerworm
Bane Thralls, Bile Thralls, Mechanithralls, Necrosurgeon & Stitch Thralls
Bloat Thralls, Machine Wraiths, Necrotech, Scrap thralls, Skarlock thrall

benefits.ingameeffect: Mechanithall units in this army gain Advance Deployment.

For each wajack in Asphyxious' battlegroup, place one wreck marker of the corresponding size within 20" of the back edge of Asphyxious' deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Wreck markers cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature.
Warjacks in the army gain +2SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Cankerworm
Bane units, Cephalyx units, Withershadow combine
Necrotech scrap thralls, Skarlock thrall, Bane solos, Cephalyx solos, Bane lord Tartarus

benefits.ingameeffect: Cephalyx units gain Advance Deployment.

You can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially
Each warjack in Asphyxious' battlegroup is automatically allocated 1 focus point at the start of your first Control Phase. This focus is in addition to any points Asphyxious allocates.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Cankerworm, Malice
Bile Thralls, Mechanithralls, Necrosurgeons, Soulhunters, Withershadow Combine
Warwitch Sirens, non-character undead Cryx solos
Wraith Engines

benefits.ingameeffect: Add a Necrotech solo free of cost for each helljack or colossal in the army. These solos ignore FA restrictions.
Pistol Wraith solos gain Advance Deployment
For each unit in the army, one model can begin the game with a corpse or soul token.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks
Bile Thralls, Mechanithralls
Necrotechs, Scrap Thralls, Pistol Wraiths, Skarlock Thrall, Warwitch Solos

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Up to one Helljack gain Advance Move for each Warwitch Siren solo in the army. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Nightmare
Bane Knights, Cryx units with Incorporeal
Skarlock Thrall, Cryx solos with Incorporeal, Warwitch Solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Solos with Incorporeal gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Add a machine Wraith solo free of cost for each unit in the army after the second (actually, does not work, only one Machine Wraith is free!)
Models in Deneghra's battlegroup gain Ghostly during your first turn of the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks with Pathfinder
Bane Thralls, Cylena Raefyll & Nyss Hunters
Cryx solos with Incorporeal, Bane Lord Tartarus

benefits.ingameeffect: Stalker Bonejacks gain Advance Deployment.
Bane Thrall units and Bane Lord Tartarus gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks
Bane units, The Withershadow combine
Necrotechs, Scrap thralls, Pistol wraiths, Skarlock thrall, Bane solos

benefits.ingameeffect: You can redeploy models in Goreshade's battlegroup after both players have deployed but before the first player first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Goreshade's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Goreshade does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks
Bane units, Thrall units
Bane solos, Thrall solos

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Krakens begin the game with one corpse token per Mechanithrall unit in the army.

type.models: Cryx non-character bonejacks, Cryx helljacks with Amphibious
Black Ogruns Boarding Parties, Bloodgorgers, Revenant units, Satyxis units
Necrotechs, Scrap thralls, Skarlock thrall, Satyxis solos, Capt. Rengrave, Gen. Gerlak Slaughterborn.

benefits.ingameeffect: Helljacks with Amphibious gain Advance Deployment.
Models/units gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

For each helljack in Skarre's battlegroup, place one 4" AOE anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Skarre's deployment zone after both players have finished deploying their armies but before the first player takes his first turn. The AOE is shallow water terrain. These AOE cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature.
General Gerlak Slaughterborn and medium-based units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Freebooter, Mariner
Black Ogrun Boarding Parties, Revenant units, non-character Sea Dog units
Skarlock Thall, Warwitch Sirens, Undead solos with 'Jack Marshal

benefits.ingameeffect: The army can include non-character Sea Dog units, Freebooter warjacks, and Mariner warjacks. These models are considered to be friendly Cryx models.
Revenant units gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Bonejacks with Pathfinder or Flight gain Advance Deployment.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks
Satyxis units
Satyxis solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Satyxis models/units gain Stealth during the first round of the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks
Bile Thralls, Mechanithralls, Necrosurgeon & Stitch Thralls, Soulhunters
Bloat Thralls, Necrotechs, Scrap Thralls, Warwitch Sirens

benefits.ingameeffect: Scrap Thralls solos gain Advance Deployment.
Helljacks gain Stealth during your first turn of the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Deathjack
Bloodgorgers, Soulhunters, Revenant units
Necrotechs, Scrap Thralls, Skarlock Thrall, Revenant solos, Darragh Wrathe, Gen. Gerlak Slaughterborn

benefits.ingameeffect: Capt. Rengrave and Revenant units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Revenant models/units gain Incorporeal during your first turn of the game.
Helljacks in Terminus' battlegroup with Amphibious gain Advance Deployment.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks
Black Ogrun Boarding Parties, Bloodgorgers, Mechanithralls, Necrosurgeon & Stitch Thrall
Pistol Wraiths, Skarlock Thrall, Gen. Gerlak Slaughterborn

benefits.ingameeffect: For each unit included in the army, place up to one 3" AOE cloud effect in play after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. These AOE must be placed within 20" of the back edge of Venethrax's deployment zone and remain in play for one round. Cloud effects cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature. Models with Eyeless Sight do not ignore these cloud effects. These cloud effects leave play after the first round of the game.
Gerlak Slaughterborn and Bloodgorgers units gain Advance Deployment.
Seether Helljacks in Venethrax's battlegroup gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Deathjack
Bane Knights, Satyxis Blood Witches, Soulhunters, The Withershadow Combine
Necrotech, Scrap Thralls, Pistol Wraiths, Skarlock Thrall, Warwitch solos, Darragh Wrathe

benefits.ingameeffect: Soulhunter models each begin with one soul token.

You can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Up to one helljack gains Advance Deployment for each Warwitch Siren solo in the army.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Malice
Bile Thralls, Mechanithralls, Necrosurgeon & Stitch Thralls
Iron Lich Overseers, Machine Wraiths, Necrotechs , Scrap Thralls , Skarlock Thrall, Warwitch Sirens

benefits.ingameeffect: Iron Lich Overseers can 'jack marshall up to 3 warjacks.
Reduce the cost of Bonejacks marshaled by an Iron Lich Overseer by 1. Reduce the cost of Helljacks marshaled by an Iron Lich Overseer by 2.
Machine Wraiths gain Ambush.
Each model with Soul Taker starts with an extra soul.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Deathjack, Erebus
Mechanithralls, Necrosurgeon & Stitch Thralls, Cryx units with Magic Ability
Necrotechs , Scrap Thralls, Skarlock Thrall, Cryx solos with Magic Ability, Wraith Solos
Wraith Engines

benefits.ingameeffect: Free Scrap Thralls are not included along with the Necrotech.
Models in the army with Soul Taker each begin with one soul token.
Wraith solos in the army gain Advance Deployment.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Cryx non-character warjacks, Deathjack, Nightmare
Bile thralls, Cephalyx Mind Slavers, Cephalyx overlords, Mechanithralls, Necrosurgeon & Stitch Thralls
Iron lich Overseers, Necrotechs & Scrap Thralls, Ragman, Skarlock Thrall, Warwitch Sirens

benefits.ingameeffect: Cephalyx Mind Slaver & Drudge units gain advance deployment
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

Enemy non-warcaster/non-warlock models/units can begin the game affected by Deneghra’s upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Deneghra does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn. Models/units that cannot be targeted by Deneghra’s spells cannot be chosen as affected models.
